items.sentence: Tom didn\'t care who helped him, as long as somebody did.
Tom didn\'t even look at the report that Mary handed him.
Tom didn\'t get up early enough to catch the first train.
Tom didn\'t have enough space to do what he wanted to do.
Tom doesn\'t feel comfortable talking about his feelings.
Tom doesn\'t want to live in Boston for more than a year.
Tom couldn\'t decide exactly when he should go to Boston.
Tom couldn\'t find a job in Boston, so he came back home.
Tom couldn\'t go because he was unable to get permission.
Let\'s suppose you happen to strike it rich at the races.
It would be a mistake not to do what Tom asked you to do.
It would mean a lot to Tom if you showed up at his party.
Tom and Mary declared their undying love for one another.
Tom and Mary got married when they were still very young.
Tom and Mary have nothing in the world except each other.
Tom and Mary were always fighting when they were younger.
Tom and Mary were both sitting in front of the fireplace.
Tom wrote a love letter to Mary, but she didn\'t read it.
Tom claims he didn\'t know that that was going to happen.
Tom wasn\'t supposed to be here until after Mary arrived.
